title: Apple iPad Deals for Prime Day 2025: Save Up to $120
description: The entry-level model, iPad mini, iPad Air, and iPad Pro are all on sale. Apple iPad Deals for Prime Day 2025: Save Up to $120 Eddie Fu
author: Eddie Fu
excerpt: Amazon's Prime Day 2025 sale features major deals and discounts on Apple iPads ranging from entry level models to the iPad Pro.
text: Amazon Prime Day 2025 is in full swing from July 8th through July 11th, making it an excellent time to find deals on a new Apple iPad. Whether you’re looking for an entry-level model or an iPad Pro, you can find discounts of up to $120. See the best sales on Apple iPads below. Other Apple products are also on sales, including AirPods. For more updates on the latest Prime Day 2025 sales, subscribe to Consequence’s Facebook channel. Apple iPad (128 GB) is on sale for $279.99, a 20% discount from the list price of $349.00. This baseline model is the best iPad for most people, with an 11-inch touchscreen, USB-C charging, and 10 hours of battery life. Apple iPad mini (128 GB) is on sale for $379.00, a 24% discount from the list price of $499.00. With an A17 Pro chip, the iPad mini has an 8.3-inch display, Apple Pencil Pro compatibility, and support for Apple Intelligence — plus faster Wi-Fi speeds. Apple iPad Air 11-inch (128 GB) is on sale for $479.00, a 20% discount from the list price of $599.00. It boasts an M3 chip and 8GB of RAM for multitasking and demanding tasks like Adobe Lightroom and Premiere Rush. Apple iPad Pro 11-inch (256 GB) is on sale for $899.00, a 10% discount from the list price of $999.00. Stepping up to an entry-level iPad Pro gets you M4 silicon, an OLED display, support for Thunderbolt/USB 4, a better camera, and more storage. This year’s Amazon Prime Day also features deals on Apple AirPods and Apple Watches, as well as soundbars and Bluetooth speakers.
